notes.note:
Added support for the [WebP image format][1]


  [1]: https://developers.google.com/speed/webp/
Enhanced security for Linux, Android, and macOS users via stronger stack smashing protection being enabled by default

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 65.0beta Beta
